furniture.name: FRP Table
furniture.use: Home offices, retail stores, exhibitions, educational institutions, events or picnics, workspace, meeting rooms, dining room
description: Buddha Fiber offers a lightweight, durable, and long-lasting solution for various settings.
Its modern design makes it suitable for indoor and outdoor spaces, providing a stylish and practical addition to any environment.

furniture.name: FRP Reception Chair
furniture.use: Office, college, school, health care, government office, workshops, and retail store
description: A contemporary, durable, and stylish seating option designed to enhance reception areas for both indoor and outdoor spaces.
It provides comfort and class while welcoming guests with style and durability.

schoolFurniture.name: FRP Desk Bench
schoolFurniture.use: Schools, universities, offices, educational institutions, healthcare centers, art and craft organizations, study areas, government offices
description: A durable, lightweight, and long-lasting desk and bench solution with modern design for indoor and outdoor use.
Buddha Fiber ensures a personalized touch with a wide range of colors and designs.

schoolFurniture.name: FRP Moon Table
schoolFurniture.use: School & colleges, home offices, libraries, conference rooms, group study rooms, reception areas
description: A unique and modern piece of furniture designed to resemble a curved moon.
The Moon Table is a combination of artistic design and functional utility, bringing elegance and creativity to any space.

bathAndSanitary.name: FRP Bathtubs
bathAndSanitary.use: Apartments, residential bathrooms, hotels & resorts, homes, spas & wellness centers, healthcare facilities, rental properties
description: FRP bathtubs blend durability, elegance, and luxury, transforming your bathing space into a sanctuary of relaxation.
Customizable in size, shape, and design for unique arrangements.

bathAndSanitary.name: FRP Dustbin
bathAndSanitary.use: Indoor and outdoor settings, commercial and industrial facilities, recycling stations, public events
description: FRP dustbins provide a reliable and stylish waste management solution, ensuring a clean and hygienic environment.
They are an eco-friendly alternative to traditional waste bins.

bathAndSanitary.name: FRP Motu Patlu Dustbin
description: Designed to create an engaging waste management solution for children, inspired by the popular Indian animated series 'Motu Patlu'.
Combines functionality with fun to make waste management appealing.

agriculture.name: FRP Feeding Tray
agriculture.use: Poultry farming, cattle rearing, goat farming, cow farming
description: Constructed using high-quality fiberglass reinforced plastic, known for strength, durability, and resistance to corrosion.
Customizable sizes and shapes for specific needs.

agriculture.name: FRP Gamala (Flower Pot)
description: FRP flower pots are a popular choice for both indoor and outdoor gardening due to their durability, lightweight nature, and aesthetic appeal.
Provides a visually stunning addition to any environment.
